metadata.title: CVE-2021-34432 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse Mosquitto versions 2.07 and earlier, the server will crash ifthe client tries to send a PUBLISH packet with topic length = 0.

criterions.comment: mosquitto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
